title: Nuage Utility Host VM
description: Configuration for Nuage Utility Host VM.

hostname.title: Hostname
hostname.description: Hostname of the Nuage Utility Host instance

mgmt_ip.title: Management IP address
mgmt_ip.description: IP address of the management interface. The web UI and ssh services are only accessible on this network

mgmt_ip_prefix.title: Management IP Prefix Length
mgmt_ip_prefix.description: IP Prefix length for the management network

mgmt_gateway.title: Management Gateway IP
mgmt_gateway.description: IP address of the gateway on the management network

internal_ip.title: Internal Network IP address
internal_ip.description: IP address of the internal network interface. This network contains the VSD, VSC and other infrastructure server

internal_ip_prefix.title: Internal Network IP Prefix Length
internal_ip_prefix.description: IP Prefix length for the internal network

internal_gateway.title: Internal Network Gateway IP
internal_gateway.description: IP address of the gateway on the internal network

external_ip.title: External Network IP address
external_ip.description: IP address of the external network interface. This network is the one where NSGs reside

external_ip_prefix.title: External Network IP Prefix Length
external_ip_prefix.description: IP Prefix length for the external network

external_gateway.title: External Network Gateway IP
external_gateway.description: IP address of the gateway on the external network

target_server.title: Target Server IP or FQDN
target_server.description: Hostname or IP address of the KVM hypervisor where the DNS VM will be instantiated

cpuset.title: KVM cpuset information
cpuset.description: Cpuset information for cpu pinning on KVM. For example, NUH requires 4 cores and sample values will be of the form [ 0, 1, 2, 3 ]

mgmt_bridge.title: Management Network Bridge
mgmt_bridge.description: Network Bridge used for the management interface on the NUH. This will be a Linux network bridge when deploying on KVM. Defaults to the global setting

internal_bridge.title: Internal Network Bridge
internal_bridge.description: Network Bridge used for the internal network on the NUH. This will be a Linux network bridge when deploying on KVM. Defaults to using management bridge

external_bridge.title: Internal Network Bridge
external_bridge.description: Network Bridge used for the external network on the NUH. This will be a Linux network bridge when deploying on KVM. Defaults to using access bridge
